level.heading: DENIAL OR DISMISSAL OF REQUEST FOR FAIR HEARING (ยง 29-5905)

level.text: CFSA may deny a request for a fair hearing, or a preliminary expedited review hearing, if:
The sole issue raised by the appellant concerns the plain language of a District statute, regulation or policy; or
The request is not filed with the designated individual within the time frames set forth in ยง 5903.4 or ยง 5903.6.
CFSA may dismiss a request for a fair hearing, or an expedited preliminary review hearing, if the appellant or his representative:
Without good cause, does not appear at the expedited preliminary review hearing or the fair hearing.
